text: Ben W. Joseph (born July 17, 1942) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He is a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Democrat from the Grand Isle-Chittenden district, having been first elected in 2016.https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018.1/27186 He was previously a judge on the Vermont Superior Court from 1998 to 2010.https://www.reformer.com/stories/judge-ben-joseph-retires-after-12-years- opens-up-another-vacancy-in-vermonts-courts,118932 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Democrats Category:University of Pennsylvania Law School alumni
title: Ben Joseph
